Class Lawgbook

  • java.lang.Object
    • Lawgbook

  • public class Lawgbook
extends java.lang.Object
    Data management class for a class. All other classes access data from this class.
    It's called 'Lawgbook' because it's a pun off of the name Law.
    Version:
    3.0 October 30th, 2014
    Author:
    Jason P'ng

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<Activity> activities
      List containing activity data.
      (package private) int activityMin
      The set minimum amount of times an activity must be taught.
      (package private) java.sql.Date date
      The date this lawgbook is opened.
      (package private) java.io.File fileName
      The file that is used to represent this lawgbook when saving.

      A string version of the date for this lawgbook.

      List containing lesson data.
      (package private) boolean saved
      Determines if the current data in the lawgbook is in a saved state.

      List containing lessons sorted by priority.

      List containing all student data.

      The name of the class this lawgbook is for.
      (package private) int totalWeeks
      The amount of weeks this class is taught for.
      (package private) int weeksPassed
      The amount of weeks that have passed since this lawgbook was created.

    • Field Detail

      • students

        java.util.ArrayList<Student> students
        List containing all student data.

      • activities

        java.util.ArrayList<Activity> activities
        List containing activity data.

      • lessons

        java.util.ArrayList<Lesson> lessons
        List containing lesson data.

      • sorted

        java.util.ArrayList<Activity> sorted
        List containing lessons sorted by priority.

      • date

        java.sql.Date date
        The date this lawgbook is opened.

      • title

        java.lang.String title
        The name of the class this lawgbook is for.

      • formatDate

        java.lang.String formatDate
        A string version of the date for this lawgbook.

      • totalWeeks

        int totalWeeks
        The amount of weeks this class is taught for. It is assumed there is only 1 lesson per week.

      • weeksPassed

        int weeksPassed
        The amount of weeks that have passed since this lawgbook was created. This is recorded based on how many times the lawgbook has been updated with a lesson.

      • activityMin

        int activityMin
        The set minimum amount of times an activity must be taught. This is used to determine priority when ranking activities.

      • fileName

        java.io.File fileName
        The file that is used to represent this lawgbook when saving.

      • saved

        boolean saved
        Determines if the current data in the lawgbook is in a saved state.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Lawgbook

        public Lawgbook()
        Constructor for the lawgbook. It records the current date and formats it to String.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • addStudent

        public void addStudent(java.lang.String name)
        Adds a new Student with the given name to the arrayList of students. All rankings for the new students are set to 0.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to be given the new Student.

      • addStudent

        public void addStudent(Student s)
        Adds the given Student to the arrayList of students. This is used when reading in previously saved data.
        Parameters:
        s - The Student to add to the data.

      • addActivity

        public void addActivity(java.lang.String name)
        Adds a new activity with the given name to the data. All students rank it as 0 and the activity rankings are refreshed.
        Parameters:
        name - The name for the new Activity.

      • addActivity

        public void addActivity(java.lang.String name,
                        int completed)
        Adds a new activity to the data given name and the amount of times it has been taught. All students set the rank for this Activity as 0 and the Activity priority ranking is refreshed. This method is used when reading in previously saved data.
        Parameters:
        name - The name for the Activity.
        completed - The amount of times this Activity is set to have been taught.

      • addLesson

        public void addLesson(Lesson l)
        Adds a the given Lesson to the data.
        Parameters:
        l - The lesson to be added to the data.

      • removeActivity

        public boolean removeActivity(java.lang.String name)
        Removes an Activity with the given name from the data.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the activity to remove.
        Returns:
        Whether or not an activity was removed.

      • removeStudent

        public boolean removeStudent(java.lang.String name)
        Removes a Student with the given name from the data.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Student to be removed.
        Returns:
        Whether or not a Student was removed.

      • getRank

        public int getRank(Activity a)
        Returns the priority ranking of the given Activity.
        Parameters:
        a - The Activity to retrieve the ranking of.
        Returns:
        The ranking of the Activity. A higher number indicates a lower priority. -1 is returned if the Activity can't be found.

      • printLesson

        public void printLesson(Lesson l)
        Depreciated method. Does nothing.
        Parameters:
        l - Lesson to be printed.

      • isSaved

        public boolean isSaved()
        Returns whether or not this lawgbook has all data saved in a file.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if all the data in the lawgbook is saved.

      • setSaved

        public void setSaved(boolean save)
        Sets the saved status for this lawgbook.
        Parameters:
        save - The status for if this lawgbook is saved. True is saved, and false is unsaved.

      • setActivityMin

        public void setActivityMin(int num)
        Sets the minimum amount of times each activity needs to be taught. This affects lesson priority ranking.
        Parameters:
        num - The number to set the minimum amount of times to teach each activity.

      • getActivityMin

        public int getActivityMin()
        Returns the minimum amount of times each activity needs to be taught.
        Returns:
        The minimum amount of times to teach each activity.

      • setWeeksPassed

        public void setWeeksPassed(int num)
        Sets the amount of weeks that have passed since the creation of this lawgbook. This is tracked by the amount of times the lawgbook has been updated with a lesson.
        Parameters:
        num - Number to set the amount of weeks that have passed.

      • getWeeksPassed

        public int getWeeksPassed()
        Returns the amount of weeks that have passed since the creation of this lawgbook. This is tracked by the amount of times the lawgbook has been updated with a lesson.
        Returns:
        The amount of weeks that have passed.

      • setTotalWeeks

        public void setTotalWeeks(int num)
        Sets the amount of weeks the class runs for. This affects activity priority.
        Parameters:
        num - The amount of weeks this class will run for.

      • getTotalWeeks

        public int getTotalWeeks()
        Returns the amount of weeks the class runs for. This affects activity priority.
        Returns:
        The amount of weeks this class will run for.

      • rankActivities

        public void rankActivities()
        Sorts the activities in order of priority and stores the sorted list in the sorted ArrayList. The amount of times completed takes priority over the rankings of students unless the times completed has surpassed the minimum amount of times required to be taught.

      • formatFileName

        public static java.lang.String formatFileName(java.io.File file)
        Returns a formated filename to have the '.lawg' extension if it doesn't already have it.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to be formated.
        Returns:
        The name of the file with the '.lawg' extenstion.
